name: Save the Galaxy!!
description:
NOTE: This game was made in 48 hours by Kostyantyn Milkevych for Ludum Dare 42 Compo.

Save the Galaxy, and don't run out of space.

The Story:
Humanity discovered how to convert space into a lot of energy.
Now everything runs on space, including your hp-shield and gun.

Humanity lives happy, but some evil people have built an evil machine
to do their evil plan: to convert our galaxy to energy and kill us all.

You must prevent that outcome, by infiltrating their different bases.

Controls:
You move and jump with ARROW KEYS or WASD.
Shoot with SPACE and reload with R.

Game Tips:
Don't forget to reload when necessary.
You can see how many bullets you have left, in the bottom right corner.

Health and Space pickups can be timed for better effectivity.

The more you destroy on each level, the better score you will get.

There's permadeath, so watch out!
